modmenu.descriptionTranslation.braverbun: Adds some QOL improvements and other new utility features to the Bundle.
braverbundles.midnightconfig.title: Braver Bundles Config
braverbundles.midnightconfig.UNSTACKING_:
Allows you to store more unstackable items inside a bundle. 
Default value: 1/4 or 0.25
braverbundles.midnightconfig.ALLAY_WHITE: Allays holding bundles can collect any items found inside.
braverbundles.midnightconfig.DISPENSER_F: Dispensers with a bundle inside can drop it's contents outside.
braverbundles.midnightconfig.DISPENSER_I: If an item is in front of the dispenser with a bundle inside, the item is stored inside the bundle
